articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: The Open 2024: 'The wind got the better of me' - Rory McIlroy on Troon exit - BBC.com
articles.description: Rory McIlroy says his failure to cope with the windy conditions which prevailed for much of the first two days at Royal Troon led to his failure to make the cut at the Open Championship.
articles.content:
Rory McIlroy says his failure to master the blustery conditions over the opening two rounds at Royal Troon led to his early exit from this year's Open Championship.
